examples: I was mad when the ball hit me in the leg.

images.alt: Photo of Man Wearing Brown Suit Jacket yelling into a white telephone.
images.description: Man Wearing Brown Suit Jacket yelling into a white telephone.
images.caption: Yelling is a sign that someone is mad.

examples: He made a diving catch and stopped the ball.

images.alt: Photo of two people playing baseball.
images.description: Photo of a person diving toward a base while another is ready to catch a ball.
images.caption: One player dives toward the base while the other is ready to catch the baseball.

source.title: Two Man Playing Baseball during Daytime
source.author: Pixabay

meanings.definition: To stay until a later time.
examples: The player waited until it was safe to run to homebase.
Dirt went everywhere as the player was sliding to the base.

images.alt: Photo of a player sliding toward a base.
images.description: A player kneels, trying to block the other player. The other player slides, feet first, toward the base.
images.caption: Sliding is a way to get to a base.

source.title: Man Kneeling Trays to Stop Man While Hes Sliding Towards Base
source.author: Pixabay

meanings.definition: To note a happy event with joy.
examples: The team celebrated winning the game.

images.alt: Photo of sports team gathered in a group.
images.description: Group of Lacrosse Players Celebrating With Coach during Daytime
images.caption: This team celebrates after winning a game.
